import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Message from '../components/Message' import { addOrder } from '../actions/orderActions' function InitialOrderScreen({ match, location, history }) { const subId = match.params.id const dispatch = useDispatch() const intitialOrder = useSelector(state => state.initialOrder) const { Item } = intitialOrder useEffect(() => { if (subId) { dispatch(addOrder(subId)) } }, [dispatch, subId]) const checkoutHandler = () => { history.push('/login?redirect=payment') } return (

Order Details : Item

Subtotal

 ) } export default InitialOrderScreen
